reviewText: I ordered this DVD and when I put it in my DVD player it said it was PAL and would not play in this region. I then tried to play it in my DVD-rom drive in my computer and it worked fine. Please note that this WILL play in a computer DVD drive but NOT in a standard DVD drive.
It won't play on my computer, my external DVD drive, or my DVD player. I bought it for my Criminal Justice class as part of a unit on Hostage Negotiations. Disappointing that it would n't play.

If you know anything about the massacre in Beslan, Belarus you must see this video.  If you don't think it could happen here, think again! Could have used some more interviews and been longer.  It should have received more publicity then it did.  Better than the gorey movies coming out of Hollywood because it's real.
The dvd seemed to be of poor quality especially for the price. The documentary also was not what i expected. It left me with alot of questions unaswered..I would not recommend it.
